name: Vertigo
description:
Welcome to Vertigo world, a game inside a simulation, a game where the maps are skyscrapers, hide from your enemies, many modes coming, battle royale, deathmatches capture the flag, search and destroy, conquest, survival and more. Kill and cheat on your opponents to be the best player , build your team of friends and fight to survive.
